name: openproject
tagline: An open source project management platform for teams
description: OpenProject is an open-source project management platform supporting agile boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, and team collaboration. It can be self-hosted or run as SaaS, serving as an enterprise-grade alternative to Jira.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share documents, comment on work packages, and mention team members for coordinated project execution

features.title: Custom Workflows
features.description: Define status transitions and approval processes tailored to your organization's project methodology

features.title: Resource Management
features.description: Assign team members to tasks and track workload distribution across projects and departments

features.title: REST API
features.description: Connect with external tools and automate workflows using REST API for custom business processes
